Services

As a versatile developer based in Philadelphia, I offer a range of specialized services to help bring your projects to life. I'm available for freelance projects, contract roles, and full-time opportunities both locally and remotely.

Full Stack Development

Comprehensive web and application development with both frontend and backend expertise.

  • Responsive web applications using React, HTML/CSS
  • RESTful API development with Node.js, Python
  • Database design and integration (SQL, NoSQL)
  • Modern UI/UX implementation with Tailwind CSS
  • Performance optimization and testing
  • Cross-platform mobile development

Ideal for:

Startups, businesses needing custom web applications, or established companies looking to modernize their digital presence

Cloud/Solutions Architecture

Strategic cloud infrastructure design and implementation for optimal performance and cost efficiency.

  • Microsoft Azure deployments and management
  • Scalable infrastructure design for growing applications
  • Microservices architecture implementation
  • DevOps integration and CI/CD pipelines
  • Security implementation and best practices
  • Cost optimization strategies
  • Migration from legacy systems to cloud platforms

Ideal for:

Companies looking to migrate to the cloud, optimize existing cloud infrastructure, or implement scalable solutions for growing user bases

AI Development

Custom AI and machine learning solutions to enhance applications and provide intelligent features.

  • AI integration in web/mobile applications
  • Intelligent chatbot development
  • Data analysis and visualization systems
  • Personalized recommendation systems
  • Natural language processing implementations
  • Computer vision solutions
  • AI-powered automation for business processes

Ideal for:

Businesses looking to implement AI-driven features, automate processes, or gain insights from existing data

Music Services

Professional music instruction and vocal performance drawing from my background as a classically trained vocalist and experienced music teacher.

Vocal Performance Services

Professional Tenor Vocalist

As a classically trained tenor with extensive performance experience, I'm available for a variety of vocal performance opportunities, including:

  • Wedding ceremonies and receptions
  • Church services and religious events
  • Concert performances as soloist or ensemble member
  • Corporate events and private gatherings
  • Community theater and musical productions
  • Choral ensembles and vocal groups
View my performance experience →

Repertoire Specialties

  • Classical art songs and German lieder
  • Opera and oratorio selections
  • Sacred music (masses, cantatas, hymns)
  • Musical theater selections
  • Contemporary vocal compositions

I've performed with various ensembles including the Philadelphia Chorale, Temple University Singers, Glen Loch Men's Chorale, and as a soloist at Church of the Good Samaritan. I can provide recordings and references upon request.

Book a Performance

Music Education Services

Teaching Experience

As a former instructor at Meridee Winters School of Music and current Tenor Section Leader at Church of the Good Samaritan, I bring professional experience and a passion for music education to my teaching practice.

Lesson Focus Areas

  • Vocal technique and performance
  • Music theory fundamentals
  • Performance preparation
  • Audition coaching
  • Sight-reading skills
  • Repertoire development

Teaching Approach

I tailor my teaching methods to each student's unique learning style, goals, and experience level. My approach combines technical fundamentals with creative expression to develop well-rounded musicians.

Student Levels

  • Beginners looking to explore music for the first time
  • Intermediate students wanting to refine their skills
  • Advanced musicians preparing for performances or auditions
  • Adult learners pursuing music as a hobby or returning to practice
Inquire About Lessons

Philadelphia-Based Services

Since moving to Philadelphia in 2017, I've fallen in love with this city and take special pride in working with local businesses and organizations. I understand the unique needs and challenges of our city's growing industries.

Whether you're a startup in Center City, an established business in the surrounding counties, or an organization serving our communities, I offer tailored solutions that align with Philadelphia's entrepreneurial spirit.

I provide both in-person consultations and remote services for Philadelphia-area clients, making collaboration seamless regardless of your preference.

Contact for Local Services

My Development Approach

Collaborative Process

I believe in close collaboration with clients throughout the development process. Regular communications and feedback loops ensure that the project evolves according to your vision and requirements.

Quality-Focused

I prioritize code quality, testing, and documentation. This approach leads to more maintainable solutions and fewer issues in the long run, saving both time and resources.

Future-Proof Solutions

I design solutions with scalability and future growth in mind. By using modern technologies and best practices, your applications will remain relevant and adaptable to changing needs.

Continuous Learning

I'm committed to staying at the forefront of technology through continuous learning and professional development. This ensures that I bring the latest and most effective solutions to your projects.
